00096 static inline
00097 void CSL_lcdcEnableLiddDMA (
00101     CSL_LcdcHandle        hLcdc
00102 )
00103 {
00104     CSL_FINST(hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCR, LCDC_LCDLIDDCR_LIDD_DMA_EN, ENABLE);
00105 }
00106

00142 static inline
00143 void CSL_lcdcDisableLiddDMA (
00147     CSL_LcdcHandle        hLcdc
00148 )
00149 {
00150     CSL_FINST(hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCR, LCDC_LCDLIDDCR_LIDD_DMA_EN, DISABLE);
00151 }

00182 static inline
00183 void CSL_lcdcLiddWriteCsAddr (
00187     CSL_LcdcHandle        hLcdc,
00189     CSL_LcdcChipSelect    cs0cs1,
00191     Uint32                arg
00192 )
00193 {
00194     if (CSL_LCDC_LIDD_CS0 == cs0cs1 )
00195     {
00196         CSL_FINS (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0ADDR,
00197                                LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0ADDR_ADR_INDX, arg);
00198     }
00199     else
00200     {
00201         CSL_FINS (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1ADDR,
00202                                LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1ADDR_ADR_INDX, arg);
00203     }
00204 }

00236 static inline
00237 void CSL_lcdcLiddWriteCsData (
00241     CSL_LcdcHandle        hLcdc,
00243     CSL_LcdcChipSelect    cs0cs1,
00245     Uint16                arg
00246 )
00247 {
00248     if (CSL_LCDC_LIDD_CS0 == cs0cs1 )
00249     {
00250         CSL_FINS (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0DATA,
00251                                LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0DATA_DATA, arg);
00252     }
00253     else
00254     {
00255         CSL_FINS (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1DATA,
00256                                LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1DATA_DATA, arg);
00257     }
00258 }

00290 static inline
00291 Uint16 CSL_lcdcGetLiddCsData (
00295     CSL_LcdcHandle        hLcdc,
00299     CSL_LcdcChipSelect    cs0cs1
00300 )
00301 {
00302     if (CSL_LCDC_LIDD_CS0 == cs0cs1 )
00303     {
00304         return (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0DATA);
00305     }
00306     else
00307     {
00308         return (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1DATA);
00309     }
00310 }

00394 static inline
00395 void CSL_lcdcGetVersion (
00399     CSL_LcdcHandle        hLcdc,
00401     void                 *responseMinor,
00403     void                 *responseMajor
00404 )
00405 {
00406     *(Uint16*)responseMinor = CSL_LCDC_REGS->LCDREVMIN;
00407     *(Uint16*)responseMajor = CSL_LCDC_REGS->LCDREVMAJ;
00408 }

00451 static inline
00452 CSL_Status LCD_getSetup (
00453                CSL_LcdcHandle         hLcdc,
00454                CSL_LcdcHwSetup*       getSetup  )
00455 {
00456     Uint16    tempVar;
00457 
00458     if((hLcdc !=  NULL) && (getSetup != NULL))
00459     {
00460         /* passed parameters are ok */
00461     }
00462     else
00463     {
00464         if(hLcdc ==  NULL)
00465         {
00466             return CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE;
00467         }
00468         else
00469         {
00470             return CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
00471         }
00472     }
00473 
00474     /* Get configured information  for LIDD controller */
00475     (getSetup->config).fdoneIntEn = (CSL_LcdcFdoneCtl)
00476        CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCR, LCDC_LCDLIDDCR_DONE_INT_EN);
00477 
00478     (getSetup->config).modeSel = (CSL_LcdcLiddMode)
00479        CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCR, LCDC_LCDLIDDCR_LIDD_MODE_SEL);
00480 
00481     (getSetup->config).clkDiv =
00482        CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDCR, LCDC_LCDCR_CLKDIV);
00483 
00484     (getSetup->config).dmaCs0Cs1 = (CSL_LcdcChipSelect)
00485        CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCR, LCDC_LCDLIDDCR_DMA_CS0_CS1);
00486 
00487     tempVar = (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCR) &
00488                          CSL_LCD_LCDLIDDCR_POLARITY_CONTROL_MASK;
00489     tempVar = tempVar >> CSL_LCDC_LCDLIDDCR_RSPOL_SHIFT;
00490     (getSetup->config).polControl = tempVar;
00491 
00492     (getSetup->config).dmaEnable = (CSL_LcdcDmaCtl)
00493        CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCR, LCDC_LCDLIDDCR_LIDD_DMA_EN);
00494 
00495     /* Get configured LIDD chip selct configuration register Fields */
00496     if(CSL_LCDC_LIDD_NOT_USE_CS1 == (getSetup->useCs1))
00497     {
00498         /* Get configured LIDD CS0 configuration register fields*/
00499         (getSetup->timingCs0).rStrobe =
00500                        CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG0,
00501                                         LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG0_R_STROBE);
00502 
00503         (getSetup->timingCs0).rHold =
00504                        CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG0,
00505                                         LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG0_R_HOLD);
00506 
00507         (getSetup->timingCs0).ta =
00508                       CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG0,
00509                                         LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG0_TA);
00510 
00511         tempVar = CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG1,
00512                                  LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG1_R_SU1);
00513         (getSetup->timingCs0).rSu = (tempVar << 4) +
00514                              CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG0,
00515                                            LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG0_R_SU0);
00516 
00517         (getSetup->timingCs0).wSu =
00518                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG1,
00519                                            LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG1_W_SU);
00520 
00521         (getSetup->timingCs0).wStrobe =
00522                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG1,
00523                                        LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG1_W_STROBE);
00524 
00525         (getSetup->timingCs0).wHold =
00526                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG1,
00527                                          LCDC_LCDLIDDCS0CONFIG1_W_HOLD);
00528     }
00529     else
00530     {
00531         /* Get configured LIDD CS1 configuration register Fields */
00532         (getSetup->timingCs1).rStrobe =
00533                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG0,
00534                                         LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG0_R_STROBE);
00535 
00536         (getSetup->timingCs1).rHold =
00537                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG0,
00538                                         LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG0_R_HOLD);
00539 
00540         (getSetup->timingCs1).ta =
00541                           CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG0,
00542                                             LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG0_TA);
00543 
00544         tempVar = CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG1,
00545                                 LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG1_R_SU1);
00546         (getSetup->timingCs1).rSu = (tempVar << 4) +
00547                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG0,
00548                                           LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG0_R_SU0);
00549 
00550         (getSetup->timingCs1).wSu =
00551                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG1,
00552                                           LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG1_W_SU);
00553 
00554         (getSetup->timingCs1).wStrobe =
00555                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG1,
00556                                       LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG1_W_STROBE);
00557 
00558         (getSetup->timingCs1).wHold =
00559                            CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG1,
00560                                       LCDC_LCDLIDDCS1CONFIG1_W_HOLD);
00561     }
00562 
00563     return CSL_SOK;
00564 }
00565 
00607 static inline
00608 CSL_Status LCD_getConfigDMA (
00609                CSL_LcdcHandle         hLcdc,
00610                CSL_LcdcConfigDma*     pgetConfigDma )
00611 {
00612     Uint32      tmpAddr;
00613     Uint16      tmpAddrLSB;
00614     Uint16      tmpAddrMSB;
00615 
00616     if((hLcdc !=  NULL) && (pgetConfigDma != NULL))
00617     {
00618         /* passed parameters are ok */
00619     }
00620     else
00621     {
00622         if(hLcdc ==  NULL)
00623         {
00624             return CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE;
00625         }
00626         else
00627         {
00628             return CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
00629         }
00630     }
00631 
00632     pgetConfigDma->burstSize = (CSL_LcdcDmaBurst)
00633               CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDDMACR, LCDC_LCDDMACR_BURST_SIZE);
00634 
00635     pgetConfigDma->eofIntEn = (CSL_LcdcEofIntCtl)
00636               CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDDMACR, LCDC_LCDDMACR_EOF_INTEN);
00637 
00638     pgetConfigDma->bigEndian = (CSL_LcdcEndianess)
00639               CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDDMACR, LCDC_LCDDMACR_BIGENDIAN);
00640 
00641     pgetConfigDma->frameMode = (CSL_LcdcFrameMode)
00642               CSL_FEXT (hLcdc->regs->LCDDMACR, LCDC_LCDDMACR_FRAME_MODE);
00643 
00644     /* DMA frame buffer 0 Base Address Set */
00645     tmpAddrLSB = hLcdc->regs->LCDDMAFB0BAR0;
00646     tmpAddrMSB = hLcdc->regs->LCDDMAFB0BAR1;
00647     tmpAddr = tmpAddrMSB;
00648     tmpAddr = tmpAddr << CSL_LCD_UINT16_NUMBER_BITS;
00649     tmpAddr |= tmpAddrLSB;
00650     tmpAddr  = ((tmpAddr - CSL_LCD_SARAM_DMA_ADDR_OFFSET) >> CSL_LCD_DMA_SHIFT);
00651     pgetConfigDma->fb0Base = tmpAddr;
00652 
00653     /* DMA frame buffer 0 Ceil Address Set*/
00654     tmpAddrLSB = hLcdc->regs->LCDDMAFB0CAR0;
00655     tmpAddrMSB = hLcdc->regs->LCDDMAFB0CAR1;
00656     tmpAddr = tmpAddrMSB;
00657     tmpAddr = tmpAddr << CSL_LCD_UINT16_NUMBER_BITS;
00658     tmpAddr |= tmpAddrLSB;
00659     tmpAddr  = ((tmpAddr - CSL_LCD_SARAM_DMA_ADDR_OFFSET) >> CSL_LCD_DMA_SHIFT);
00660     pgetConfigDma->fb0Ceil = tmpAddr;
00661 
00662     /* DMA frame buffer 1 Base Address Set */
00663     tmpAddrLSB = hLcdc->regs->LCDDMAFB1BAR0;
00664     tmpAddrMSB = hLcdc->regs->LCDDMAFB1BAR1;
00665     tmpAddr = tmpAddrMSB;
00666     tmpAddr = tmpAddr << CSL_LCD_UINT16_NUMBER_BITS;
00667     tmpAddr |= tmpAddrLSB;
00668     tmpAddr  = ((tmpAddr - CSL_LCD_SARAM_DMA_ADDR_OFFSET) >> CSL_LCD_DMA_SHIFT);
00669     pgetConfigDma->fb1Base = tmpAddr;
00670 
00671     /* DMA frame buffer 1 Ceil Address Set*/
00672     tmpAddrLSB = hLcdc->regs->LCDDMAFB1CAR0;
00673     tmpAddrMSB = hLcdc->regs->LCDDMAFB1CAR1;
00674     tmpAddr = tmpAddrMSB;
00675     tmpAddr = tmpAddr << CSL_LCD_UINT16_NUMBER_BITS;
00676     tmpAddr |= tmpAddrLSB;
00677     tmpAddr  = ((tmpAddr - CSL_LCD_SARAM_DMA_ADDR_OFFSET) >> CSL_LCD_DMA_SHIFT);
00678     pgetConfigDma->fb1Ceil = tmpAddr;
00679 
00680     return CSL_SOK;
00681 }
